DOC.detailed_description: Methods/ Interventions : Patients deem meet inclusion criterion none exclusion criterion preoxygenated acceptable standard preoxygenation strategy ( non-rebreather face mask , noninvasive positive pressure ventilation , etc . ) . Patients place maintain continuous 3-lead cardiac , automatic blood pressure , pulse oximeter , waveform capnography monitor duration procedure . Prior induction , pre oxygenation phase , subject place Biphasic Cuirass Ventilation ( BCV ) device per manufacturer 's guideline . After adequate preoxygenation achieve ( determined treat emergency physician ) , BCV assist ventilation maintain standard care intubation procedure include apenic oxygenation order attend emergency physician utilized . BCV discontinue upon confirmation proper tracheal intubation waveform capnography . Safety The BCV device cover anterior chest wall , therefore , place CPR need . Therefore , patient cardiac arrest exclude . Investigators exclude patient pacemaker central line impairs ability Curiass shell secure anterior chest . Finally , patient history valvular heart disease exclude . The protocol direct device apply normal preoxygenation period ( ~within 3-5 minute period time prior administration induction paralytic medication ) . There known side effect device . There potential device application delay intubation attempt ; however , know whether delay intubation , augment patient 's breathing BCV device , negatively impact patient 's condition . The data collection form explicitly ask intubate physician think device delay intubation attempt way . The data collection form also track relevant time milestone . Both item review periodically study safety endpoint data monitoring committee include manuscript result .
